bibl.title: Waterborne Recruits: The Military Settlers of Ptolemaic Egypt.
The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power.

bibl.note: General introduction. - The origin of Ptolemaic cleruchs. - Macedonian cleruchs. - Cleruchs from mainland Greece. - Cleruchs from areas under Ptolemaic control. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Mary Stefanou, Waterborne Recruits: The Military Settlers of Ptolemaic Egypt.
Kostas Buraselis, Mary Stefanou & Dorothy J. Thompson (edd.), The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power (Cambridge, 2013) pp. 108-131, 8 tabl.
General introduction. - The origin of Ptolemaic cleruchs. - Macedonian cleruchs. - Cleruchs from mainland Greece. - Cleruchs from areas under Ptolemaic control. - Conclusions.
